document.full_text: yum brands inc , the parent of the kfc, taco bell and pizza hut fast-food chains, reported higher-than-expected quarterly sales, boosted by growth in china, helping to send its shares up 4.9 percent in after-hours
document.title: yum sales surprise, up on strength in china
lines_and_colors: yum brands inc , the parent of the kfc, taco bell and pizza hut fast-food chains, reported higher-than-expected quarterly sales, boosted by growth in china, helping to send its shares up 4.9 percent in after-hours
